replies.body: riot smite it for us lads {{summoner:11}} , we tried so hard and its only because nobody wanted to play twisted treeline {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} ,its the least you can do for the people that actually tried.
This. The one we lost last year was TT as well. Either dont make that a bonus or make the points required less. No one likes that hot garbage map and no one wants to play it

Would've got it if it wasn't TT :/

I can't stand 3v3. I loved the other modes on TT though.

The three issues are the fact it was on Twisted Treeline, so there's  less HP taken per game, the monster had more health than the first few, and kids are going back to school, so there's a smaller pool of players that contribute. It's just shitty time.

this, the problem wasn't that it was twisted treeline, so much as people expected twisted treeline to perform on the same level as summoners rift. The boss should have been easier to account for the TT disadvantage. We really tried and some of us liked having TT open for so long, but it's not practical to expect TT to match or beat SR.

It is rigged, it's got nothing to do with TT, as a bonus map TT still only gave us 6 points, rift or howling both give 5, or 10 if it's a bonus map, I played TT as much as I could last night, wasn't till after that I realized that I might have well been playing the rift with friends. They should have given TT +2 so it was 9 points per game as a bonus.
>yeah{{item:3070}}

If you guys really want the icon then stop bitching about how bad the damn map is and do yourself a favour and just play on it! People these days tend to bitch more than actually play. It's called a "Reward" and it's meant to be EARNT! If no one wants to play on "that hot garbage map" as some people call it, then too bad! You don't deserve a reward! Easy as that!

I had some games with people last night who really wanted the summoner icon unlocked that they just went in game and sat at their fountain and let us win. (There was 1 1/2 hours left on the timer). They expressed their concern in all chat and decided to take one for the community. And instead of us reporting AFK, we Honoured them for being an Honourable Opponent. The community needs to come together and be crafty to beat these challenges. In this event the fight isn't amongst us Summoners, We're playing for each other here when a community reward is given for a challenge. Now another TT map is up, let's find a way to get this challenge done!

Let's go OCE! We can still do this! Lets tone down the complaining about the TT map and just play for the sake of all the Homeguards wanting this Summoner Icon!
*Earned

Yeah... except that it's statistically harder in terms of game length, and team size

It's not only harder because less people like TT, but also because it reaps less rewards per minute

yeah and it's harder to ping objectives to close out a TT game, especially when your team refuses to go for vilemaw (or goes for vilemaw but then discovers that it's hard without a tank or jungler). Some of my TT games went on for around an hour.
i agree

yeah just today i went into a TT game and asked if they were there for oce week, they said yes so i told them just to let the other team win for quicker points. while in the game they started to play for fun because now they dont care about oce week. i really hate this community some times

who even likes nexus seige? Of all the gamemodes, of all the people I've talked to, none of them seem to like this game mode. I personally like ascension, urf and one for all quite a bit. Some of my friends really enjoy poro king, I don't but, I have not met a single nexus siege fan.

when do we get are shit ? im on 20 points and ive not gotton anything from it zzz

As per the FAQ on the main page and the client/site main section, you will get the 20 point bonus prize at the end of the event. The Chest+Key required you to earn 4 points by the 3rd Win, which has already been given out. The Summoner Icon will be given out within 24 hours of the completed battle. The other hextech key + chest requires the final battle to be completed.
ty

2 Things - Firstly it's on TT. No one plays it not only because it's trash and ugly but because the queue times are between 15 and 30 minutes, and ocean week is perfectly placed in a period of time in which kids are returning to school and the kids take up a large amount of the player base.

Last night when I was watching the timer you guys cut it off when there was a few mins left but it was already counted as a loss maybe if you didn't cut it off we could have gotten it *cough* *cough* give the icon to the people that tried pleeeasee {{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}}

Riot, please just move the 3 v 3 focus events to the start of the week with the lower values 
Because TT is arguably the least favorite map, but more than that, it's because even for a 25-30 minute game, you've only got 3 people on each team, meaning it's only -6hp max per game, as opposed to -10 per game from aram or summoners rift

It's fine to have TT on the event rotation, but it makes the least sense to have it as the penultimate monsters
Honestly no one wants to play twisted treeline. Give us the damn icon.
